overview: Overwhelmed with her new employee's outstanding performance, Brooklyn can't help but express her deep affection. Ramon, overworked and ready to leave his job, decides to stay when his boss, Angela, confesses that she can't be without him. When Reagan loses an important account, Chad calms her down with a soothing massage. In the heat of the moment, James gives in to his bosses sexual advances when she hatches the perfect plan to keep it a secret.
title: Boss Lady 2
